sentences.en: Do not say anything to disillusion them.
sentences.cn: 别说什么叫他们泄气的话.
我真不想使他的幻想破灭.

sentences.en: I hate to disillusion you, but I don’t think she’s coming back.
sentences.cn: 我真不愿意让你失望，但我想她是不会回来了。

sentences.en: I hate to disillusion you, but not everyone is as honest as you.
sentences.cn: 我实在不愿把实情告诉你，但并非人人都像你那样诚实。

sentences.en: I hate to disillusion you, but your chances of winning are practically zero.
sentences.cn: 我不忍心使你失望, 但你取胜的机会实际上等于零.

sentences.en: I knew it all, the whole drab compass of marital disillusion.
sentences.cn: 我清楚地知道婚姻幻灭的单调乏味的境界.

sentences.en: I'd hate to be the one to disillusion him.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意成为那个让他幻想破灭的人。

sentences.en: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
sentences.cn: 爱是幻想之子也是幻灭之母.

sentences.en: Love the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
sentences.cn: 幻想产生爱情,爱情导致幻灭.

sentences.en: Nor is the disillusion just about money.
sentences.cn: 人们的失望情绪不仅仅是因为钱.

sentences.en: She recalled the hatred that followed the disillusion, and finally the indifference.
sentences.cn: 她回忆起尾随幻想破灭而至的憎恨, 以及最终的冷漠.

sentences.en: She still believes in Santa Claus and it will be cruel to disillusion her.
sentences.cn: 她仍然相信有圣诞老人,要是使她这一幻想破灭就于心不忍了.

sentences.en: She still believes in Santa Claus and it would be creel to disillusion her.
sentences.cn: 她依然相信有圣诞老人,要使她这一幻想破灭还真于心不忍.

sentences.en: She still believes in Santa Claus and it would be cruel to disillusion her.
sentences.cn: 她仍然相信有圣诞老人,要是使她这一幻想破灭就于心不忍了.

sentences.en: There is disillusion with established political parties.
sentences.cn: 对各个确立的政党有幻灭感。

trans.tran_en: to make someone realize that something which they thought was true or good is not really true or good

trans.tran_cn: 使不再抱幻想，使理想破灭，给…泼冷水，使醒悟
